Inline Editor

iMathEQ Math Equation Editor works well with TinyMCE Inline Editor. Inline Editing allows you to edit any element on the page in-place. Inline editor provides a real WYSIWYG experience "out of the box", because unlike in classic editor, there is no <iframe> element surrounding the editing area. The CSS styles used for editor content are exactly the same as on the target page where this content is rendered!
